items.title: Instacart’s AI-driven pricing tool attracted attention — now the FTC has questions
items.description: In an economy where everyone's feeling squeezed, AI-driven price testing of kitchen essentials was bound to attract attention.

items.title: Adobe hit with proposed class-action, accused of misusing authors’ work in AI training
items.description: The lawsuit is just the latest in a string of copyright-related legal complaints aimed at the AI industry.

items.title: Jared Isaacman confirmed as next head of NASA
items.description: Isaacman will run the space agency at a time when Trump is trying to both downsize it and task it with returning astronauts to the moon.

items.title: YouTube to pull music data from Billboard’s charts because it doesn’t like its ranking formula
items.description: YouTube takes its ball and goes home by pulling Billboard's access to its music data.

items.title: YouTube will stream the Oscars — exclusively — beginning in 2029
items.description: The news highlights YouTube's growing dominance in the television space and a major shift as streaming takes on more live events.
